title: André Bukia
text:
André Watshini Bukia (born 3 March 1995) is a <a href="Democratic%20Republic%20of%20the%20Congo">Congolese</a> professional <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as a left winger in Portugal for <a href="F.C.%20Arouca">Arouca</a>.
Career.
Club.
On 12 July 2019, Bukia signed for <a href="FC%20Kaisar">FC Kaisar</a>.
International.
Bukia is a youth international for the <a href="DR%20Congo%20national%20football%20team">DR Congo national football team</a>, and has received a callup to the senior team for a friendly against <a href="Romania%20national%20football%20team">Romania</a> in May 2016.
